mapper.select: SELECT od.cod, od.num, o.order_date, c.name as 'clientName', od.product_cod, p.prodname, u.name as 'unitName', od.qty, od.delivery_date, od.note FROM orderdetail od JOIN orders o ON o.cod = od.cod JOIN client c ON o.client_cod = c.cod JOIN product p ON od.product_cod = p.cod JOIN unit u ON p.unit_cod = u.cod WHERE mps_state = 'N'
